hero.description: I support companies on frontend architecture, stack modernization (Vue/Nuxt) and technical decision support — with a pragmatic approach to AI when it brings real value.

process.title: How I work
process.description: A structured and collaborative approach to reduce uncertainty, clarify options and secure technical decisions.

discovery.title: Scoping & context
discovery.description: Understanding the challenges, constraints (legacy, team, delivery) and decisions to be made. Clarifying objectives and success criteria.

design.title: Analysis & options
design.description: Targeted audit, risk mapping, identification of realistic options and their trade-offs (cost, timeline, maintenance, performance).

development.title: Actionable recommendations
development.description: Proposal of a strategy (migration, target architecture, safeguards) and a concrete plan: quick wins, milestones and documented decisions.

optimization.title: Support & follow-up
optimization.description: Regular sessions, architecture reviews, support for Tech Leads/CTOs, and adjustments based on field feedback.

consulting.title: Frontend architecture
consulting.description: Architecture audits, target trajectories and modernization strategies for complex frontends — with explicit trade-offs, long-term clarity and controlled migrations (especially Vue/Nuxt).

workshops.title: Consulting & decision support
workshops.description: External advisory support to clarify, prioritize and arbitrate high-impact technical decisions: architecture choices, strategic options and long-term direction.

audit.title: Pragmatic AI usage
audit.description: Identification of meaningful AI use cases and integration paths into existing systems — with measurable value, explicit risks and no unnecessary complexity.
